name: Untitled Sailing Game
description:
///UPDATE//////////////////////////////////////////////////////
The sound does not work in the WebGL version right now. To experience the full game please download the Windows version below. Thank you!
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

This game was heavily inspired by wind waker. I wanted to create a game that really captured the feeling of exploring an open sea. I think the project was a bit too ambitious for a game jam, but I am still proud of what I could create. I also learned a lot about what has made me successful in previous game jams and what I could do to improve future jams.

Features

  • 3 Unique Communication Beacons To Activate
  • 5 Island / Formation Areas to Explore
  • Sailing Mechanics with real buoyancy and wave simulations
  • First Person Controls and 3rd Person Boat Driving
